I don't know about crash, but I agree it's a major factor underpinning the demand.
High oil price = high USD inflows into oil producing countries. Dropping oil => less USD inflows => weaker money => debt problems
I think the oil price does what it does, but oil being paid for in USD has particular effects on emerging markets.
